name: Ms.Abilasha P B
department: Dept. of Applied Mathematics & Computational Sciences, PSG College of Technology, Coimbatore, Tamilnadu, India.
qualifications: B.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - PSG College of Arts and Science   - 2019M.Sc  ( Mathematics )  - PSG College of Arts and Science   - 2021(Ph.D)  ( Mathematics )  - PSG College of Technology
in_brief: I am an Assistant Professor working at the Department of Applied Mathematics and Computational Sciences. My research interests are Mathematical modeling and epidemic models.

publications.title: The dynamics of the fractional SEIQR malware spread model on wireless sensor networks
Enhancing transmission control of the COVID‐19 epidemic in India: optimal strategies and approaches
Analyzing nonlinear dynamics of dengue epidemics: A fractional order model with alert state and optimal control strategies
An optimal control of bi-modal COVID-19 SEIQR epidemic spreading model in India
Nonlinear analysis and dynamics of COVID-19 mathematical model with optimal control strategies
